text: From the half-tribe of Manasseh: Taanach with its pasture lands and Ibleam with its pasture lands. These belonged to the rest of the Kohathite clan.
Peace Treaty. Lysias heard that Philip, whom King Antiochus, before his death, had appointed to train his son Antiochus to be king,
They cannot resist a king or enemy forces.
They scurried about the surrounding country and began to bring in the sick on mats to wherever they heard he was.
For my flesh is true food, and my blood is true drink.
